ygData.subject: Re: Swimming Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: Interesting... I m pretty darn sure that my swimming skill always maxes out. I used to swim A LOT from Erudin to Kerra Isle (which is a longer than average
ygData.messageBody:
Interesting... I'm pretty darn sure that my swimming skill always maxes out.
I used to swim A LOT from Erudin to Kerra Isle (which is a longer than
average swim), and always saw my skill stop rising until I leveled - then it
would take off another 5 pts quite quickly then stop again.

Can't speak for the trade skills.

-----Original Message-----
From: Lomack [mailto:lomack@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 9:38 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Skills

From: Lomack <lomack@...>

Trade Skills I know for sure do not have a level cap for
skill. I have a
friend who is a Dark Elf Necromancer on Fennin Ro. At level
17 he has a
Smihting skill 126. By the level+1 times 5 rule he should
be maxed at 85.
However, this is not the case. Any of the trade skills as
well as swimming
(yes I am counting Fishing as a trade skill) have a 255
skill cap but none
other based on level that I have seen.

Lomack
